text: Deborah Lynn Derryberry (born September 27, 1967) is a voice actress. She worked "Squeeze Toy Aliens" in Toy Story and Toy Story 2. She is known as the voice of Jimmy Neutron in The Adventures of Jimmy Neutron: Boy Genius. ==Career== Derryberry also voiced characters in the Pixar films Toy Story, A Bug's Life, Toy Story 2, and Incredibles 2. She is the voice of Clay in the Playhouse Disney segments Derryberry's only role in anime is the voice of Candy in the Glitter Force series. ==Filmography== ===Animation=== List of voice performances in animation Year Title Role Notes Source -1998 Bobby's World Jackie Resume -1995 Taz-Mania Jake The Addams Family Wednesday Addams Aaahh!!!
